name: sun-times-daily-generator
description: Automated daily city page generator for sun times website with real API data and SEO optimization

scripts.test: node -e "const { SimpleDailyGenerator } = require('./generate-daily-pages.js'); const gen = new SimpleDailyGenerator(); gen.getCitiesToAdd(3).then(cities => console.log('Test cities:', cities));"
scripts.deploy: npm run generate && git add . && git commit -m "Daily sun times update - $(date +%Y-%m-%d)" && git push origin main

author: Your Name
